South Hampstead High School                    London  
Achieved Grades: 8A*s & 3As  
SKILLS   
 Enthusiastic individual with strong oral and written interpersonal skills  
 Highly effective critical thinker and team member , with excellent attention to detail  
 Motivated and focused towards completing challenges with a keen attention to detail  
 Self-starter with a curious and adaptable mind  
 Extensive leadership experience leading to improved  team and individual performance  
 Excellent knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint  
TECHNICAL SKILLS   
 SolidWorks    
 Ansys Fluids   Fusion360  
 MATLAB  
INTERNSHIP EXPERIENCE  
Environmental Engineer                  Summer 2019  
Bentley Motors Ltd                Crewe, Cheshire  
 Attained “Carbon Neutral” Status on behalf of Bentley, requiring high organisation and proactive 
thinking to meet tight deadlines. Bentley is the first Luxury Car company to attain this status  
 Key skills employed included effective time management and stakeholder management  
 
A350 Wing Manufacturing Engineer        July 2018 - 
July 2019  
Airbus UK                Broughton, North Wales  
 Gained an understanding of the challenges surrounding production, such as the importance of 
effective co mmunication between the engineering and production departments  
 Learned to respond quickly and effectively to technical problems using the recommended 
business processes and protocols.  
 
Military Air and Information Engineer                 Summer 2017  
BAE Systems Ltd           Warton, Lancashire  
 Learned about the product life cycle through the lens of a business  
 Became aware of and therefore learned about policies such as export control restrictions  
FURTHER EXPERIENCE  
Student Ambassador           2017 - 2020 
University of Sheffield, Aerospace Engineering             Sheffield  
 Enthusiastic  presentation  skills to communicate the university ethos to prospective students  
 Responsibility for helping other aerospace students to attain year in industry placements through 
the aid of interview preparation, CV writing and sourcing advertised placements.  
Ski Instructor                December 2017 & 2018  
Sport Alpin & Ski School Oberlech            Zell Am See & Oberlech, Austria  
 This vastly improved my communications sk ills, in both German and English, as well as my 
ability to lead and remain calm in stressful situations.  
 High level of customer service skills required and ability to multi -task 
HOBBIES, INTERESTS  
As an avid  sports and outdoor  activity enthusiast  I am often found seeking thrills through my many 
sporting hobbies. Over the last decade I have competed in hockey at n etball, primarily at school, and 
more recently in women’s rugby. During university, my passions shifted when I discovered rock climbing 
and cycling, both MTB and road cycling which are my current hobbies.  . I really feel that this keeps both 
my mind and body in shape and helps me dea l with stress and focus.  During my Year in Industry  at 
Airbus , I spent my free time either on the rugby pitch or attaining my Private Pilot’s License.  
LANGAUGES  
 German : High Fluen cy/Bilingual  
 Spanish : Good  
 Italian : Beginner/Good  
REFERENCES - Available on request

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
